name: Luckie Ball
description:
Luckie Ball is a short precision platformer where nothing is fully solid. You'll float to the top of everything!

Inspired by the Flash games you used to play in the school computer lab, Luckie Ball features dozens of hand-drawn levels for you to traverse through. The tight and responsive controls lend well to advanced mechanics and optimized movement.

  • Collect Luckie Coins to unlock a wealth of bonus levels and character skins!
  • Take on the Extreme Gauntlet, a set of three torturous levels that'll test the limits of your patience and skill. Expert understanding of the physics engine is mandatory.
  • Flex your creative muscles with the custom level creator! Share the level file with your friends so they can enjoy your masterpieces too.
  • Need another way to compete? Set the fastest time you can in Speedrun Mode!

All of this content is totally free. There's no in-app purchases or paid DLC! That means there's no excuse for you not to play. Or maybe there is. I'm not you, I wouldn't know.
